Helpdesk.title: Tickets
Helpdesk.subtitle: Report a problem with a laboratory or equipment. We will try to solve it as soon as possible.

TicketStatus.notFound: Ticket not found. Check if the link is correct.
TicketStatus.pending: Your ticket is pending verification. Check your email inbox and click the verification link.
TicketStatus.open: Your ticket has been verified and is waiting for processing.
TicketStatus.inProgress: Your ticket is currently being processed.
TicketStatus.resolved: Your ticket has been successfully resolved! The problem has been fixed. Thank you for contacting us!

TicketForm.title: New Ticket
TicketForm.emailDescription: Required AGH email address. We will send a verification link.
TicketForm.descriptionHelp: Describe the problem as detailed as possible
TicketForm.error: An error occurred while creating the ticket

MemberDetails.infoContent: Choose an available slot and provide your AGH email address. After the host approves your request, you will receive an email with the room number.
MemberDetails.successDesc: Check your email inbox and confirm the reservation by clicking the verification link.
